Miami.The Setai Miami Beach: The Setai Hotel and Residences, also known as The Setai Miami Beach and The Setai South Beach, is a high rise luxury hotel and condominium located in South Beach, Miami Beach, Florida. The building has 38 floors and is 117.5 meters tall, making it one of the tallest buildings in Miami Beach. The hotel includes a recording studio and a 10,000-square-foot (930 m2) penthouse that includes a rooftop pool and jacuzzi.
